languages.text:
"Как чуток слух твой, странник без пути.
Приноровившись различать мотив
Мелодии ночной, именовать
Себя по праву можешь виртуозом".

traits.locale_text:
"Как чуток слух твой, странник без пути.
Приноровившись различать мотив
Мелодии ночной, именовать
Себя по праву можешь виртуозом".
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"You listen well, oh pathless wanderer,
Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,
And title virtuoso you have earned."
languages.original_text:
"Как чуток слух твой, странник без пути.
Приноровившись различать мотив
Мелодии ночной, именовать
Себя по праву можешь виртуозом".

Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,
And title virtuoso you have earned."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

"You listen well, oh pathless wanderer,
Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,
And title virtuoso you have earned."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

traits.locale_text:
"You listen well, oh pathless wanderer,
Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

traits.locale_text:
"You listen well, oh pathless wanderer,
Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,
And title virtuoso you have earned."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
“彷徨的流浪者啊，请听好。
你辨认出了夜曲的主旋律，
你赢得了演奏大师的称号。”
languages.original_text:
"You listen well, oh pathless wanderer,
Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,
And title virtuoso you have earned."

traits.locale_text:
“彷徨的流浪者啊，请听好。
你辨认出了夜曲的主旋律，
你赢得了演奏大师的称号。”
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
«Escucha bien mis palabras, viajer{mf|o|a} sin camino:
el leitmotiv de la música nocturna has discernido
y, por tanto, el título de virtuos{mf|o|a} has obtenido».
languages.original_text:
"You listen well, oh pathless wanderer,
Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,
And title virtuoso you have earned."

traits.locale_text:
«Escucha bien mis palabras, viajer{mf|o|a} sin camino:
el leitmotiv de la música nocturna has discernido
y, por tanto, el título de virtuos{mf|o|a} has obtenido».
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
「道なき放浪者よ、君はよく聞く
夜の音楽の思想を見抜き
巨匠の称号を手に入れた」
languages.original_text:
"You listen well, oh pathless wanderer,
Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,
And title virtuoso you have earned."

traits.locale_text:
「道なき放浪者よ、君はよく聞く
夜の音楽の思想を見抜き
巨匠の称号を手に入れた」
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Ihr hört gut zu, pfadloser Wanderer,
erkennt das Leitmotiv der Nachtmusik.
Virtuose dürft Ihr Euch nun nennen."
languages.original_text:
"You listen well, oh pathless wanderer,
Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,
And title virtuoso you have earned."

traits.locale_text:
"Ihr hört gut zu, pfadloser Wanderer,
erkennt das Leitmotiv der Nachtmusik.
Virtuose dürft Ihr Euch nun nennen."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
« Vous êtes {mf|attentif|attentive}, {mf|vagabond|vagabonde} sans voie.
La rengaine de la musique nocturne ne vous échappe pas,
Au titre de virtuose vous avez donc droit. »
languages.original_text:
"You listen well, oh pathless wanderer,
Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,
And title virtuoso you have earned."

traits.locale_text:
« Vous êtes {mf|attentif|attentive}, {mf|vagabond|vagabonde} sans voie.
La rengaine de la musique nocturne ne vous échappe pas,
Au titre de virtuose vous avez donc droit. »
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"İyi kulak veriyorsun yolsuz gezgin,
Gece müziğinin nakaratını fark ettin,
Ve virtüöz ünvanını hak ettin."
languages.original_text:
"You listen well, oh pathless wanderer,
Night music's leitmotif you have discerned,
And title virtuoso you have earned."

traits.locale_text:
"İyi kulak veriyorsun yolsuz gezgin,
Gece müziğinin nakaratını fark ettin,
Ve virtüöz ünvanını hak ettin."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle
